TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEventBindingService

summary.span: 为注册组件事件的事件处理程序提供服务。

span.span: Provides a service for registering event handlers for component events.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 该事件绑定服务提供链接事件处理程序与设计器代码中的组件事件的方法。The event binding service provides a way to link an event handler with a component event from designer code. 若要链接事件处理程序组件事件使用，你必须首先获取你想要链接的组件的事件。To link an event handler with a component event using the , you must first obtain an for the event of the component you intend to link. 提供一些方法，可以将转换到可以用于配置事件与事件处理程序方法名称。The provides methods that can convert an to a which you can use to configure the event with an event handler method name. 对象提供方法可用于获取包含组件的每个事件的对象。The object provides a method that you can use to obtain an containing objects for each event of a component. 和方法返回每个传递给上述任一方法。The and methods of the return a for each passed to either method. 每个从返回或属性类型为 string。Each returned from or has a property type of string. 你可以将此字符串设置一个值，指示要链接使用事件的事件处理程序方法的名称为方法。You can set this string to a value that indicates the name of the event-handler method to link the event with using the method of the . ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个设计器，使用链接在设计时何时调用为组件的设计器添加自定义的快捷方式菜单命令与一个事件处理程序的组件的事件。The following example demonstrates a designer that uses the to link a component's event with an event handler at design time when the custom shortcut menu command that the designer adds for the component is invoked. 若要使用示例、 编译为类库、 从 Windows 窗体项目添加引用、 将组件类库中添加到工具箱中，右键单击工具箱和...，选择自定义工具箱选择类库然后单击确定，并将 EventControl 实例添加到窗体。To use the example, compile it to a class library, add a reference from a Windows Forms project, add the component in the class library to the Toolbox by right-clicking the Toolbox and selecting Customize Toolbox..., then choosing the class library and clicking OK, and add an instance of the EventControl to a Form. 右键单击将 EventControl，然后单击连接 testEvent 快捷方式菜单命令。Then right-click the EventControl and click the Connect testEvent shortcut menu command. 创建一个空的事件处理程序方法并将 EventControl 的 testEvent 方法初始化为此事件处理程序的初始化代码在窗体。An empty event handler method is created and the EventControl's testEvent method is initialized to this event handler in the initialization code for the Form. [!code-cpp[IEventBindingServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IEventBindingServiceExample/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[IEventBindingServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IEventBindingServiceExample/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[IEventBindingServiceExample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/IEventBindingServiceExample/VB/source.vb#1)]

Public Function CreateUniqueMethodName (component As IComponent, e As EventDescriptor) As String
public: System::String ^ CreateUniqueMethodName(System::ComponentModel::IComponent ^ component, System::ComponentModel::EventDescriptor ^ e);

param.name: component
param.span: 事件连接到的组件实例。

span.span: The component instance the event is connected to.

param.name: e
param.span: 要为其创建名称的事件。

span.span: The event to create a name for.

summary.span: 为指定组件和事件的事件处理程序方法创建唯一的名称。

span.span: Creates a unique name for an event-handler method for the specified component and event.

returns.span: 为此事件的事件处理程序方法建议的名称。

span.span: The recommended name for the event-handler method for this event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回与用户的源代码中的任何其他方法名称唯一的名称。This method returns a name that is unique from any other method name in the user's source code.

param.span: 要为其获取兼容事件处理程序方法的事件。

span.span: The event to get the compatible event-handler methods for.

summary.span: 获取其方法签名与指定事件兼容的事件处理程序方法的集合。

span.span: Gets a collection of event-handler methods that have a method signature compatible with the specified event.
A collection of strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 集合中的每个字符串是方法的具有与指定的事件兼容的方法签名的名称。Each string in the collection is the name of a method that has a method signature compatible with the specified event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法显示代码编辑器，并将光标置于上指定的事件声明的行。This method displays the code editor and positions the cursor on the line that the specified event is declared on.
